WizardLevel9Spells.Name: Astral Projection
WizardLevel9Spells.Description: You and up to eight willing creatures within range project your astral bodies into the Astral Plane.

WizardLevel9Spells.Name: Foresight
WizardLevel9Spells.Description: You touch a willing creature and bestow a limited ability to see into the immediate future.

WizardLevel9Spells.Name: Gate
WizardLevel9Spells.Description: You conjure a portal linking an unoccupied space you can see within range to a precise location on a different plane of existence.

WizardLevel9Spells.Name: Imprisonment
WizardLevel9Spells.Description: You create a magical restraint to hold a creature that you can see within range.

WizardLevel9Spells.Name: Meteor Swarm
WizardLevel9Spells.Description: Blazing orbs of fire plummet to the ground at four different points you can see within range.

WizardLevel9Spells.Name: Power Word Kill
WizardLevel9Spells.Description: You utter a word of power that can compel one creature you can see within range to die instantly.

WizardLevel9Spells.Name: Prismatic Wall
WizardLevel9Spells.Description: A shimmering, multicolored plane of light forms a vertical opaque wall--up to 90 feet long, 30 feet high, and 1 inch thick.

WizardLevel9Spells.Name: Time Stop
WizardLevel9Spells.Description: You briefly stop the flow of time for everyone but yourself.

WizardLevel9Spells.Name: True Polymorph
WizardLevel9Spells.Description: Choose one creature or nonmagical object that you can see within range.

WizardLevel9Spells.Name: Weird
WizardLevel9Spells.Description: Drawing on the deepest fears of a group of creatures, you create illusory creatures in their minds, visible only to them.

WizardLevel9Spells.Name: Wish
WizardLevel9Spells.Description: Desire is the most potent source of magic.
